text: This is a list of rivers that are at least partially in Spain. The rivers are grouped by sea or ocean. The rivers flowing into the sea are sorted along the coast. Rivers flowing into other rivers are listed by the rivers they flow into. Rivers that have their mouths in Portugal are given in italics. The list begins in Catalonia at the French border and moves clockwise around the Iberian Peninsula. ==Mediterranean Sea== ===Catalonia=== *el Ripoll *la Muga *el Fluvià *el Ter *la Tordera *el Besòs **el Congost *el Llobregat **l'Anoia **el Cardener **la Gavarresa *el Foix *el Gaià *el Francolí *la Sénia ===Ebro=== *el Ebro **Cidacos **Ega **Aragón ***Aragón Subordán ***Arga ***Candanchú **Jalón ***Jiloca ***Piedra **Gállego ***Aguas limpias ***Caldarés ***Escarra ***Lana Mayor ***Aurín ***Guarga ***Seco ***Asabón ***Sotón **Guadalope ***Bergantes **Segre ***Cinca ****Ara *****Arazas ****Ésera ****Lanata ***Noguera Ribagorzana ***Noguera Pallaresa **Queiles ===Levante (Valencian Community and Region of Murcia)=== *Mijares *Turia *Júcar **Cabriel **Albaida **Huécar **Valdemembra **Magro *Serpis *Rambla de las Ovejas *Vinalopó *Segura **Mundo **Mula **Guadalentín **Alhárabe ===Andalucian Mediterranean=== *Guadalfeo **Trevélez ***Poqueira *Guadalhorce *Guadalmedina *Guadiaro **Guadalevín ==Atlantic Ocean== ===Costa de la Luz=== *Guadalete **Majaceite *San Pedro *Guadalquivir **Guadiana Menor **Guadalbullón **Genil ***Darro **Corbones **Guadaíra **Guadiamar *Rio Tinto **Odiel *Guadiana **Guadalupe **Záncara **Jabalón **Záncara **Matachel **Chanza ===Portuguese Atlantic=== *Tajo **Alagón **Jarama ***Lozoya ***Manzanares ***Henares **Guadarrama **Alberche ***Cofio ***Perales **Tiétar *Duero **Adaja **Tormes **Tamega **Pisuerga ***Carrión ***Odra **Esla ***Cea ***Órbigo **Trabancos **Valderaduey **Huebra **Águeda ===Spanish Atlantic=== *Minho **Avia **Sil *Tambre *Ulla **Sar *Lérez *Anllóns *Eo *Nalón *Narcea *Navia *Sella ** Dobra *Deva **Cares *Saja *Gándara *Pas **Pisueña *Nervión **Cadagua **Ibaizabal *Mundaka *Oria **Leitzaran *Urola *Urumea *Bidasoa ==France== *The Garonne, a tributary of the Gironde estuary in Val d'Aran is the only river in Spain that drains North of the Pyrenees into the Atlantic. == Other websites == * Rivers of Spain in INE (Spain) * Spain Spain
title: List of rivers of Spain
